item.title: Shim and InstanceBehavior fallthrough to isolate part of the SUT
item.description: I’ve dealt in a previous post with the new Shim library in Vs11 that permits you to test “difficult to test code” and I showed a really simple example on how to use Shim to isolate the call to DateTime.Now to simulate passing time in a Unit Test. Now I want to change a little bit the perspective of the test, in the test showed in previous post I simply exercise the sut calling Execute() a couple of time, simulating the time that pass between the two calls.
